text: [Music]
Victoria's Secret raspberry bombshell
cocktail this recipe actually came up
when your windows having a Victoria's
Secret Fashion Show okay so Chambord
vodka not regular Chambord Chambord
vodka followed by some Chambord which is
a raspberry liqueur followed by lemonade
okay some cranberry juice and then we
come behind with some fresh squeezed
lemon juice real easy to make okay
the most difficult thing you might have
is finding the Chambord block the liquid
like I said which is a raspberry because
if you can't find that just grab a
raspberry vodka and roll with it homeboy
shake shake shake water into our martini
glass come behind with some blackberries
okay and then we have a little lemon
peel eleven little lemon twists on there
oh we are good to go it's cute look like

sip mm-hmm
